instructions: 以左手邊的 Abstract Group為參考點，準備出發。
目的地就在前方的 Xencelabs/XOOT。

companies.name: Xencelabs/XOOT
companies.description: Xencelabs is a designer and manufacturer of professional pen tablets and pen displays for digital artists, illustrators, and designers, offering advanced features for natural drawing, customization, and workflow efficiency. XOOT specializes in ergonomic monitor arms for pen and touch displays, providing artists with stable, easily adjustable drawing surfaces to enhance comfort and productivity.
companies.categories: Input Devices, Monitors/Displays/Terminals, Robotics and Gadgets, Workstations
